DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate ability tedisamil convert atrial fibrillation flutter normal sinus rhythm ( NSR ) male patient .
DOC.brief_title: Intravenous Tedisamil Rapid Conversion Atrial Fibrillation Flutter Normal Sinus Rhythm Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Willing sign inform consent screen examination perform study drug administer Males > 18 year age Subjects document ( 60 second rhythm strip ) symptomatic atrial fibrillation flutter ( duration > 3 hour < 45 day ) time randomization Subjects distress hemodynamically stable ( supine systolic blood pressure > 90 mmHg diastolic blood pressure < 105 mmHg ) Acute myocardial infarction cerebrovascular accident Coronary heart failure symptom Lifethreatening ventricular arrhythmias electrocardiogram ( ECG ) abnormalities Electrolyte abnormality Concurrent antiarrhythmic treatment
